function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proposing new ontologies without proper validation or testing","Impact":"Could lead to inaccurate or misleading information in COVID-19 analytics","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough validation and testing of proposed ontologies before implementation","Technologies":"Ontology validation tools, testing frameworks","People":"Researchers, developers","Owner":"Research institutions, development teams"},{"Description":"Lack of reporting on the tools used to develop proposed ontologies","Impact":"Unclear methodology and potential for errors in ontology development","Mitigation":"Require comprehensive reporting on the tools and methodology used for ontology development","Technologies":"Documentation standards, reporting frameworks","People":"Researchers, authors","Owner":"Research institutions, publishers"},{"Description":"Limited automation of existing tools for rule execution and data annotation","Impact":"Slower and less efficient COVID-19 analytics processes","Mitigation":"Invest in tools and technologies that enable higher automation of analytics processes","Technologies":"AI-based automation tools, machine learning algorithms","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, technology vendors"}]}
